name: Gary Dickerson
text:
This store gets a 5 star rating from me.I ordered a medium sausage and pepperoni pizza. I wanted it well done and crispy. .my pizza was done to perfection
. Need I say mire?

name: Wai Chan
text:
We did take out. Pizza was very good. Love the options. Stuffed crust with Cajun was fantastic.
I've had stuffed crust before but this was superior. (Mostly Pizza hut though) ‚Ä¶More

name: Corina Fletcher
text: Absolutely the best customer service I have had in any restaurant in a long time.. the gentleman that took our order was fantastic. We were sitting outside and he walked the pizza out.. made my day

name: Jess Roberts
text: I am so eased with the service and food from this location. I had to grab a slice soon as I got it...

name: Abigail Ellis
text: Anna was amazing! We had placed an order and their systems went down! She was very helpful. Made sure our order got put through and still in a timely manner! Food is delicious! Thank you Anna for your superior customer service!

name: Christi Anguiano
text: Wow the staff there is amazing. Helpful in so many ways. I wish I would have got the girls name who helped me. She was the nicest most helpful person I've ever encountered at any food place I've ever been. Thanks a million for great service and great pizza!

name: Shelly Fierro
text: This is the best chain pizza I've EVER had for the price. This is the best fast food pizza chain in town, hands down. $7.99 for a large 2-topping that's DELICIOUS? You just can't beat it! Service is quick too! This is my husband's and my pizza go-to in Jacksonville!

name: George
text: Everything was great!!!  The pizza, breadsticks, and wings were awesome.  The gentlmen that answered the phone knew every aspect of pricing and the menu without hesitation.   The young man that delivered our food was curtious, professional, and extremely polite.  This place is great and well worth the very reasonable price.

name: Hannah Sanford
text: rather have Little Caesars.... dined in before and saw roaches. though maybe just from the bad weather. then got wings since dining is closed and they were undercooked. raw chicken and roaches? this place needs to be shut down.

name: Neal Chamberlain
text: Excellent pizza and fantastic service. Matt is a great guy and runs a terrific business! Super thankful for how much they support our local community as well.

name: Danielle McMillan
text: One of the best pizza chains in Jacksonville. I accidentally messed up an online order and I called them and they replaced the pizza for free.  Now that's what I call excellent customer service. Keep up the great work!

name: Jenny Silvia
text: I can't even explain how great their food and customer service is.  I've never ate a bad thing from here and their delivery is super fast.  I absolutely LOVE Hungry Howies!!!

name: Tabby Barton
text: Love this place!! Awesome deals and amazing pizza!!

name: Barbara Evanson
text: The pizza was tasty, but it was pricey.  The only reason we went to this particular pizza joint, is because one of my kids had a certificate for a free personal pizza from a school program.  We ordered the free personal pizza and bought ‚Ä¶More

name: C C
text: Very Friendly staff, very tasty pizza, very reasonable prices, go eat at Hungry Howie's!

name: S H
text: Love this place and this location! Everything I've ordered here tastes yummy! Great location, service and awesome food! What more can you ask for?! Thank you, Hungry Howie's!

name: GlitchOut01
text: If your looking for a good quick pizza, this is my go to.  Not gourmet but way better than most chains "cheap" pies

name: Mariposa Baez
text: This review is to let the manager and staff at the Midway Park location know that I appreciate you all for taking the time to care about your customers. I absolutely love the pizza and hot wings! Have a blessed day. Sincerely, your satisfied customer

name: Kenny Sellers
text: Love Hungary Howie's great food and service...ty..

name: Melinda Blaze
text: Everything is great, except I had to stop ordering the cookie, last few times I got it, it has tasted super dry even microwaving it a few seconds doesn't save it lol.

name: Marissa K.
text: The food is amazing! We found our new favorite pizza jointüçïA++++

name: Lucky Hearts
text:
OUTSTANDING food. Huge portions. Absolutely delicious  We ordered an Italian sub, a Caesar salad , cheddar cheese bread and a Howie cookie
In the past we have ordered their pizza and always loved it tonight we decided ‚Ä¶More

name: Summer willis
text: Off the chain pizza ...love the crust and the brownie cake is to die for

name: Josh Baylies
text: First time was great this is my second and the crust is soaked in greese maby its beacause of a different location but very disappointing

name: Robert Lovett
text: Great food, enjoyed the sandwich and cheese bread.  Delivery was on time and driver was very cordial.  Will go again.  My orginial score was 3 but that was petty so I had to give it a 4 they are nearly a 5 for me.

name: Christopher Jones
text: Very fast delivery. Would recommend love their flavored crust.

name: Kimberly Charfauros
text: Right after the hurricane this place was awesome. They had power restored before we did and it was nice to get hot food that tasted great but didn't cost a fortune.

name: Philip Mathis
text: Hungry Howie has great service, and thier food is delicious.

name: Anna Day
text: it's ok. Was good but staff doesnt know anything in terms of what they sell. Messed up the order and gave wrong info. Only reason got 3 was the food good.

name: Kimberly McKay
text:
I ordered from this place at least once a week. Never had a problem till on 7/19/17 at about 9:00 the guy took my correct order.
When my wings got here they looked red like they were spicy. ‚Ä¶More

name: Broken Record
text: Name should be changed to Hungry Howie's Soggy Cardboard Flavored Crust Pizza.

name: Tanner Harnish
text: Great!!! Good food we ordered online pretty simple to navigate. Food was here way before 40 min. Great place awesome job.

name: Nina Mahlum
text: The most flavorful pizza. Customize how you like yours.  Quick delivery service and phenomenal customer service. This location is, hands down, our FAVORITE.

name: Todd Johnson
text: Staff was very knowledgeable on home repairs. They helped me with guidance on how to build a cat for my pet cat very helpful

name: Joe W.
text: This review is only missing one star because it's a chain joint.  I don't really consider chain restaurants to be actual restaurants.  Obviously, you get what you pay for as far as the food goes; it's a pizza joint that pumps out cookie ‚Ä¶More

name: Roger Tyras
text: Great change from the Hutt! A variety of flavors for your breadsticks and dipping sauces, not to mention they use plenty of cheese! (NO SKIMPING!)

name: J McN
text: Good pizza, super nice workers. No complaints whatsoever.

name: Corey Price
text: Ive gone here numerous times n always loved it, however 2day as i took lunch n got my normal howie rolls. still same price was shocked 2 see that it was half a howie roll and u ordered 2 as i usually do which 2gether made 1. Highly disappointed and will no longer b going herr

name: raul pineda
text: Pizza is great and at a decent price.

name: Susan Gillette
text: Thank you Matt for taking care of my children..you and your staff are the best. Not being able to see the damage for myself from the Hurricane..knowing I could order food for my children and you delivered it..I will never forget this as a Mom..üòä

name: Kalem Cossette
text: Loved their deep dish pizza. The crust flavor options was a new thing for me, and it was delectable.

name: Trista Salvucci
text: Their sandwiches are AMAZING (chicken bacon ranch) they dont have as awesome deals as dominoes and I prefer dominoes wings. But howies crust and main entrees are addicting !

name: Rodney Quick
text: JUST GREAT PIZZA

name: xKittyKylo Studios
text: Amazing service, delivery is rather quick and delivery drivers are extremely friendly. Good quality foods!

name: Jacquelyn Pickartz
text: Called in for a delivery. Girl taking my order kept having me repeat myself. Good arrived in the timeframe I was told. Caesar salad wasn't good, it was made with iceberg lettuce and had some brown lettuce. Pizza is pretty basic, nothing exciting to it.

name: Joannie Moore
text: Ordered 2 meatball subs and they were the best I've ever had. Will definitely order again when I travel back to Jacksonville!

name: Ari & Kaarina Heikkinen
text: Mmmm

text: Clean. Friendly service. Fast.

name: BELLA PLAYZ
text: Fast, great customer service

name: kt
text: The employees are absolutely awesome....   they are so sweet and personable.  The food was very good.  The salad that was ordered was insanely huge for the price.....  Very satisfied with this order..... great to have this type of service ‚Ä¶More

name: Nancy Shepard
text: Wonderful service....owner more than willing to go over and above to get everything ready and right for me!

name: Tyff Winn
text: My husband and I orded from the website last night. It charged my card yet they had  no order from us. We called both stores. So thanks. And the women was rude. She didn't even let me finish my sentences and i feel like they did little to ‚Ä¶More

text: by far the best hungry howies I've been to.  the service was incredible.  the pizza sub/calzone was out of this world.  I'll definitely be back!!!!!

name: pedro jusino
text: Have to wait two hour for a pepperoni medium pizza with a butter cheddar crust. (New Hungry Howie's here in Jacksonville,NC) I love Hungry Howie's from Orlando,FL. (11774 E Colonial Dr,Orlando, FL 32817) but this flavor does not ‚Ä¶More

name: MysticVolt
text: "Order a pizza for the kids they in least than 15 minutes, so I highly recommend this place for anyone looking for something quick and easy."

name: Sara
text: The pizza is very basic. Similar to Little Ceasers not worth the money or the time it takes to get to you. The owner is also racist. I would not recommend anyone to support this man or this business.

name: Karissa Teeter
text: Super awesome, friendly employees and management. Food is always hot, fresh, and super delicious !!!

name: M C
text: Pizza always fresh and delicious!

name: Luis Anguiano
text: Good pizza great taste!

name: Anthony Krause
text: I live 1/2 mile from hungry howies...If I could give them 0 stars I would. The service was horrible. Told us the food would be delivered in 45 mins... 1 hour and 30 minutes later our order arrived "Italian calzone with veggies and a small ‚Ä¶More

text: Great pizza at a great price. They have many deals available, too!

name: Markers Makes

name: Micheala Everitt
text: Wasn't sure if my order went threw so I had gone through so I called them and the gentleman on the phone was extremely polite and helpful. And receive my food (which was done perfectly) in great time!

name: Hunter Jurek
text: I live a mile from hungry howie's, they told me 40 mins for delivery,  and I am now going on two hours for a SALAD!!!!!

text: First time eating Howie's and I ordered online they showed up 10 minutes before the estimated time. The food was excellent as well.
